topic.question: 1. The new student is nervous about the test.
option: He is happy about the test.
He thinks the test is easy.
He is worried about the test.

topic.question: 2. The instructor placed the book on the table.
3. Mr. Richards employs a lot of people.
option: A lot of people work for Mr. Richards.
A lot of people live with Mr. Richards.
A lot of people agree with Mr. Richards.
A lot of people listen to Mr. Richards.

topic.question: 4. Most accidents take place in heavy traffic.
option: Accidents occur when there are many cars.
Accidents are cut down during the night.
Accidents increase when the light are red.

topic.question: 5. Bill arrived at the lab just in time.
option: He arrived at the lab early.
He arrived at the exact time.

topic.question: 6. Which of these is part of a person's face?
7. What is the capacity of this water tank?
8. Jim wants to clean up. What does he want to do?
9. Tom said, "Sometimes I eat out." Where did sometimes Tom have his meals?
10. Telephone bills are paid monthly.
option: They are paid in the same amount.
They are not usually paid by the month.

topic.question: 11. Why was the school closed today?
12. Lt. Edwards went to a party. Where did he go?
13. He tried to avoid the accident. What did he try to do?
14. John and Mary had an argument. What did they have?
15. The container in the closet is marked flammable. What's in it?
option: a liquid with a bad smell

topic.question: 16. Tom is not in class because he has been sick for two weeks.
option: Tom has been in class for two weeks.

topic.question: 17. Suzan needs another blanket.
18. Mary looks like her mother.
option: She is looking for her mother.
She is fond of her mother.

topic.question: 19. I would rather have tea.
20. His work is known for its quality.
option: He does not have much work.
He does not like to work.

topic.question: 21. My car is out of order.
option: I keep it outside at night.
I have bought a new one.

topic.question: 22. Take your time.
23. The organization set up a training schedule.
24. Stick to your studies.
25. The air we breathe is invisible.
26. John will entertain the visitors.
option: John will turn away the visitors.

topic.question: 27. This box is easy to lift because it is so light.
28. The instructor was illustrating the new method. What was he doing?
option: He was finding fault with it
He was reading and writing about it.
He was explaining it with pictures.

topic.question:
29. Mary bought a pair of shoes for four dollars plus twenty cents tax.
How much does the shoes cost without the tax?
30. This box is made of an alloy. What is it made of?
31. Tom glanced through the book. What did Tom do?
option: He got it at the store.

topic.question: 32. Ann will be trained to do the job. What will happen to Ann?
option: She will be ordered to do it.
She will be tired from the job.
She will be taught how to do the job.

topic.question: 33. He is the author of these books.
34. The company hired a lot of people last year.
option: They fired a lot or people.
They employed a lot of people

topic.question: 35. I don't know weather he will come.
option: I don't know if he will come.
I don't know why he will come.
I don't know when he will come.
I don't know how the will come.

topic.question: 36. I wish the raining season were over.
option: I wish it would last longer.
I wish it would get colder.

topic.question: 37. You'd better hurry. It's sprinkling a little now.
option: There are a few seats left.

topic.question: 38. The soldiers rescued the trapped lieutenant.
39. Roy checked out this morning.
option: He was given some money this morning.
He was out of cash this morning.

topic.question: 40. I am running short of cash at present.
option: I have more money than usual.
I have a lot of cash at present.

topic.question: 41. I like my steak well done.
42. Henry, please take charge of the class.
43. It was necessary for my sister to drop out of school.
option: She had to discontinue going to school.
She had to leave the room for a few minutes.
The bus driver let her off at the school.

topic.question: 44. The supermarket is out of fruit.
option: There is a lot of fruit.

topic.question: 45. Here. Put on this coat.
46. John said that Helen might come to visit him. What did John say?
option: that she would perhaps come to visit him
that she must come to visit him
that she ought to come to visit him
that she'll visit him by all means

topic.question: 47. It sounds like Jack enjoyed himself at the party.
option: Jack enjoyed the sound at the party.
Jack didn't like sounds at the party.
It seems that Jack had a good time.
Jack himself didn't like the party.

topic.question: 48. Mrs. Smith didn't meet the captain.
option: She doesn't want to see him.
She doesn't want to wait for him.

topic.question: 49. I am looking forward to meeting him.
option: I am eager to meet him.

topic.question: 50. The weather was cloudy yesterday morning. But it cleared up last night.
option: The clouds went away last night.

topic.question: 51. They fought off a surprise air raid.
52. Private Jones was assigned to guard duty.
option: He was told to do guard duty.
He was not allowed to do guard duty.
He was excused from guard duty.
He was ready to do guard duty.

topic.question: 53. Joe went to a sporting goods store to buy a fishing rod.
54. The car lost the right front tire. What did the car lose?
option: a bold from the right wheel.

topic.question: 55. The enemy gave up to the superior forces. What did the enemy do?
56. Did Anna complain about her trip?
option: Yes, she finished the trip a week ago.
Yes, she said she didn't like the food or the people.
No, she went both ways by boat.
No, she had many suitcases with her.

topic.question:
57. M: Have you seen my new dog?
W: Yes. He is very nice.
Q: How does the woman feel about the dog?

58. M: Did John use the interstate highway?
W: Yes, he did.
Q: What was John doing?

59. W: I am sorry, sir, but you can't go in.
M: But I have an official pass.
Q: Why does the man think he should be allowed to enter?
option: He has permission from someone in authority.
He thinks his reason for entering is very important.

topic.question:
60. W: Doctor, can't you help us?
M: I am sorry, I can't. I don't have my instruments.
Q: What does the doctor need?

61. W: How are your patients?
M: They are all doing well, except for the man in room 212.
Q: Where does the conversation most likely take place?

62. W: Did you add those numbers to get a total, Sam?
M: Yes, Mary, but there is a discrepancy between my total and yours.
Q: What do we know about Sam's total?
option: It is not the same as Marv's.
It is not as easy as Mary's to get.

topic.question:
63. W: What's that?
M: It's an example of modem art.
W: Yes, but what is it constructed of?
Q: What does she want to know?

64. M: Where are the tools?
W: In the back of the store.
Q: Where did she say they are?
option: They are in the rear part of the store.
They are outside, behind the store.
They are upstairs, in a storage room.
They are in the basement of the store.

topic.question:
65. M: May I help you?
W: Yes. I'd like an explanation for this letter.
Q: What does the woman want?
option: a stamp to mail the letter
the reason why the letter was written
something with which to seal the letter.

topic.question:
66. M: What happened to your coat?
W: It wore out.
Q: What did the woman mean?
